name: Frostblade
description:
DISCLAIMER: This game is an alpha build, therefore major changes can and will occur! I only had two weeks to throw this together, so there may be some bugs and glitches which will be fixed. Play on, fellow gamers!  (〃＾▽＾〃)

You play Vulen Thornheart, a dark elven gunslinger, the right hand of King and Queen Briarstone. The ice mage Enora has kidnapped their daughter, Princess Aerith. Can you rescue the princess before it's too late?

(Made for My First Game Jam Winter 2020!!)
